name: Goku
desc: The main protagonist of Dragon Ball series. Goku is a Saiyan warrior who seeks to protect Earth from various threats while constantly striving to become stronger.

name: Vegeta
desc: The prince of the Saiyan race and rival to Goku. Vegeta is initially introduced as a villain but later becomes one of Earth's greatest defenders.

name: Gohan
desc: The eldest son of Goku and Chi-Chi. Gohan is a powerful warrior who has saved the Earth multiple times, often surpassing his father's strength.

name: Piccolo
desc: Originally a villain, Piccolo becomes one of Earth's greatest allies. He is the reincarnation of the evil King Piccolo and serves as a mentor to Gohan.

name: Krillin
desc: One of Goku's closest friends and a skilled martial artist. Krillin is a key member of the Z Fighters and has fought alongside Goku in many battles.

name: Tien
desc: A skilled martial artist and former student of Master Roshi. Tien is known for his powerful techniques, including the Tri-Beam.

name: Yamcha
desc: A former desert bandit turned martial artist. Yamcha is known for his bravery and has fought alongside the Z Fighters in numerous battles.

name: Chiaotzu
desc: A small, telekinetic warrior and lifelong friend of Tien. Chiaotzu possesses psychic abilities and has fought against many powerful foes.

name: Goten
desc: The second son of Goku and Chi-Chi. Goten is a playful and energetic fighter who closely resembles his father in both appearance and abilities.

name: Trunks
desc: The son of Vegeta and Bulma from the future timeline. Trunks is a skilled warrior who travels back in time to warn the Z Fighters of impending danger.

name: Android 18
desc: A powerful cyborg created by Dr. Gero to serve his vendetta against Goku. Android 18 later joins the Z Fighters and forms a family with Krillin.

name: Android 17
desc: The twin brother of Android 18 and another creation of Dr. Gero. Android 17 is a skilled fighter who protects wildlife on a secluded island.

name: Frieza
desc: An intergalactic tyrant and one of the most powerful villains in the universe. Frieza is responsible for the destruction of Planet Vegeta and many other atrocities.

name: Cell
desc: A bio-engineered creature created from the cells of the greatest warriors in the universe. Cell seeks perfection and poses a grave threat to Earth.

name: Majin Buu
desc: An ancient and malevolent being who was awakened by the wizard Babidi. Majin Buu possesses immense power and childlike innocence.

name: Beerus
desc: The God of Destruction of Universe 7. Beerus maintains balance by destroying planets and is accompanied by his attendant, Whis.

name: Whis
desc: An angelic being and the attendant of Beerus. Whis is incredibly powerful and serves as both a mentor and caretaker to Beerus.

name: Bulma
desc: A brilliant scientist and inventor, and one of the founding members of the Z Fighters. Bulma provides crucial technological support to her friends.

name: Chi-Chi
desc: The wife of Goku and the mother of Gohan and Goten. Chi-Chi is a fierce and protective mother who wants the best for her family.

name: Videl
desc: The daughter of Mr. Satan and the wife of Gohan. Videl is a skilled martial artist who fights for justice alongside her husband.

name: Mr. Satan
desc: A famous martial artist and champion of the world. Mr. Satan is known for his exaggerated ego but is ultimately a good-hearted individual.

name: Turtle
desc: A talking sea turtle and lifelong friend of Master Roshi. Turtle has been a companion to the Z Fighters for many years.

name: Master Roshi
desc: A wise and powerful martial artist known as the Turtle Hermit. Master Roshi is one of Earth's greatest fighters and mentors to Goku and Krillin.

name: Yajirobe
desc: A reclusive warrior and ally of the Z Fighters. Yajirobe is known for his cowardice but has proven himself in battle when needed.

name: Kami
desc: The Guardian of Earth and the Namekian counterpart to Piccolo. Kami is a wise and ancient being who watches over the planet.

name: King Piccolo
desc: The evil counterpart of Kami and the original incarnation of Piccolo. King Piccolo seeks world domination and is responsible for great destruction.

name: Raditz
desc: The older brother of Goku and a low-class warrior of the Saiyan race. Raditz comes to Earth to recruit Goku but ends up clashing with him.

name: Nappa
desc: A Saiyan warrior and former general of the Saiyan Army. Nappa accompanies Vegeta to Earth in search of the Dragon Balls.

name: Ginyu
desc: The captain of the Ginyu Force, an elite squad of mercenaries in Frieza's army. Ginyu is known for his ability to switch bodies.

name: Recoome
desc: A member of the Ginyu Force known for his immense strength and flamboyant personality. Recoome is one of Frieza's most loyal soldiers.

name: Burter
desc: A member of the Ginyu Force known for his incredible speed. Burter considers himself the fastest being in the universe.

name: Jeice
desc: A member of the Ginyu Force known for his powerful energy attacks. Jeice is often seen alongside Burter during battles.

name: Guldo
desc: A member of the Ginyu Force with psychic abilities. Guldo uses his telekinesis to immobilize his opponents in battle.

name: Dende
desc: A young Namekian who becomes the new Guardian of Earth after Kami. Dende possesses great healing abilities and a strong connection to nature.

name: Mr. Popo
desc: An enigmatic character who serves as the assistant to Kami. Mr. Popo is responsible for maintaining the lookout and training the Z Fighters.

name: Shenron
desc: The Eternal Dragon summoned by the Dragon Balls. Shenron has the power to grant any wish within his creator's power.

name: Broly
desc: The Legendary Super Saiyan with immense power. Broly is known for his uncontrollable rage and desire for vengeance against Goku.

name: Bardock
desc: The father of Goku and Raditz and a low-class warrior of the Saiyan race. Bardock is known for defying Frieza's orders and standing up against tyranny.

name: Caulifla
desc: A powerful Saiyan from Universe 6 and leader of the Saiyan gang. Caulifla possesses immense potential and quickly masters Super Saiyan transformations.

name: Kale
desc: A timid but immensely powerful Saiyan from Universe 6. Kale is Caulifla's protégé and possesses a unique berserker form.

name: Hit
desc: The legendary assassin from Universe 6 known as the 'Legendary Hitman.' Hit is known for his time-skipping ability and stoic demeanor.

name: Cabba
desc: A Saiyan warrior from Universe 6 and protege of Vegeta. Cabba is a noble fighter who seeks to protect his universe from threats.
